results.name: Triangle by columns, odd columns of Pascal's triangle A007318, else (1, 0, 0, 0,...)
comment: Row sums = a variant of A052950, starting (1, 1, 3, 4, 9, 16, 33,...); whereas
Column 1 of the inverse of A178616 is a signed variant of A065619 prefaced
formula: Triangle, odd columns of Pascal's triangle; (1, 0, 0, 0,...) as even columns k.
Alternatively, (since A178616 + A162169 - Identity matrix) = Pascal's triangle,
we can begin with Pascal's triangle, subtract A162169, then add the Identity
